actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources.

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of the Army to conduct a study of the feasibility of modifying the project for navigation located at Lake Montauk Harbor, New York, for the purpose of making navigation improvements to that project.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to conduct a study of the feasibility of modifying the project for navigation located at Lake Montauk Harbor, New York, for the purpose of making navigation improvements. Establishes reporting requirements. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Army to conduct a study of the feasibility of modifying the project for navigation located at Lake Montauk Harbor, New York, for the purpose of making navigation improvements to that project.
